2/4/26, 2:20 PM Repositories - Jenski - Test portal- RPD Linux
Managing objects
Managing system objects / Repositories
Repositories
You can work with repositories to do a variety of tasks.
In this section:
Changing the retention period for a repository
You can change the Retention period of an existing repository to increase or decrease the period of time it stores job and document data and
history information.
Changing the folder location for a repository
You can change the Folder location of an existing repository.
Parent topic: Managing system objects
1 of 1
